page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Today, I got up at half past seven.I got dressed in my school uniform and ate my porridge. After that Mummy put my hair up, then my sister and I got in the car and mummy drove us to school. First, we went in the hall and had assembly. Then we went in the classroom and wrote a story. Before that we had a radio programme and we sang songs. After we had movement and drama, we had dinner and I had sandwiches, peppermint creams and crisps. Then we went outside to play.aftre a while the teacher blew the whistle and we went inside. Then we practised for Sports Day: we ran, skipped and did the relay race. Then we went inside and did some mathematics. After school we played rounders and then I went home and Lisa came to play and we went swimming.
